subject: Re: [junit] hello:passing parameters
msgSnippet: ... I have difficulty understanding what you re trying to accomplish. In general, suites do not pass information to other suites through parameters, and
messageBody:
shyam wrote:
>
> hi all,
> please give me an example of how to pass parameters
> when i create a suite consisting of multiple suites.
>
> i.e
>
> public static Test suite()
> {
> TestSuite suite()=new TestSuite();
> suite.addTest(junit.suite);
> return suite;
> }
> in the above example is ther any means by which i can
> pass an argument to teh junit.suite.what should be the
> modifications that are to be made.
> let me know.

I have difficulty understanding what you're trying to accomplish. In
general, suites do not pass information to other suites through
parameters, and neither do tests do that to other tests.

Can you describe the context for us, so we can suggest an alternate
solution?
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
